item.description:
The 2011 Worcester VegFest will be returning to Worcester State University on Sunday, April 17th from 12pm-5pm!

New to the veg community in our city? Lets re-cap. The Worcester VegFest is a free festival that brings the local community together to celebrate vegetarianism– an animal-friendly, environmentally sustainable, and healthy lifestyle. Our event features socially responsible businesses, inspiring national and local speakers, musicians, and plenty of complimentary samples of vegan food and products. The event will have also have educational exhibits, family-friendly activities, fund raising raffles and free parking.

Speakers

Bruce Friedrich, VP of PETA, Board Member of Christian Vegetarian Association  

Will Potter, Author Green Is The New Red

Terry Hope Romero, Author Veganomicon, Vegan Cupcakes Take Over the World, Viva Vegan

Tracye McQuirter, author By Any Greens Necessary: A Revolutionary Guide for Black Women Who Want to Eat Great, Get Healthy, Lose Weight, and Look Phat

Want to get involved?  For volunteer information contact Kaylee at Kaylee@VegWorcester.com or info@VegWorcester.com

http://vegworcester.c...
item.name: Worcester VegFest
